channel.title: Refs on IOFiber
channel.description: Recent content in Refs on IOFiber

item.title: this_fiber
item.description: class fiber::this_fiber; To have access to a this_fiber object, just spawn() a fiber and an object of this type will be created for you. You can copy and pass it around freely to other functions as you wish, but you should only use its methods within the fiber context (i.e. within the fiber execution stack) that created it. Important fiber is a typedef for basic_fiber<boost::asio::io_context::strand>.
